author: The Editorial Board
title: Long Live Nancy Pelosi
text:
Nancy Pelosi has dominated House Democrats for 15 years, and some have begun to suggest that it’s time for her to go. This would be bad news for Republicans, but the reality is that the anti-Pelosi rhetoric is mostly campaign posturing.
Republicans aim to use the 77-year-old Mrs. Pelosi as a scarecrow in midterm races. In Georgia’s 6th Congressional district special election last year, Democrat Jon Ossoff struggled to create daylight between himself and Mrs. Pelosi, and his narrow loss was a lesson for right and left.
...
